description: If you drink too much, and pass out in front of your friends, you should expect to be fucked with. After a heavy drinking night, one roommate is totally gone in his bed, while his friends put random stuff on top of him. He wakes up, only to find himself in the middle of a weird conversation. They started asking him over and over if he ever mess around with a guy, in which his answer was a definite no. They kept bothering him so much with it, that he would let them touch his cock, only if they shut the fuck up. Well, one thing leads to another and all of a sudden the two roommates are fucking like animals. I guess persistence pays off.
title: Cooking Dicks
